 CxList XPath = All.FindByMemberAccess("XPath.compile") +
	All.FindByMemberAccess("XPath.evaluate");
CxList inputs = Find_Read();
CxList sanitized = Find_Sanitize();

result = XPath.InfluencedByAndNotSanitized(inputs, sanitized);
